Title: Microbiology
PreReq: One BIOL course and one semester of chemistry from among CHEM 104, CHEM 106, CHEM 111, or CHEM 201

Title: Principles of Human Physiology
PreReq: BIOL 220, CHEM 104 or CHEM 106 or CHEM 111 or CHEM 201

Title: Biological Engineering Analysis I
PreReq: BIOL 270 and one semester each of calculus, physics, and organic chemistry, taken concurrently with BIOL 456.

Title: General Chemistry I
PreReq: “C” (2.0) or higher in MATH 112 or the equivalent; high school chemistry or “C” (2.0) or higher in CHEM 104.

Title: Nutrition for Healthcare Professionals
PreReq: Select One Course: CHEM 106 or CHEM 111

Title: Elementary Statistics
PreReq: Satisfy Placement Table in this section, or MATH 098 with grade of P.

Group_CategoryNotes: Math Math 121 Calculus is strongly suggested if graduate study is intended.
Title: College Algebra
PreReq: Satisfy Placement Table in this section, or MATH 098 with grade of P.

Group_CategoryNotes: Math Math 121 Calculus is strongly suggested if graduate study is intended.
Title: Precalculus Mathematics
PreReq: Satisfy Math Placement Table in this section, or grade of P in MATH 098.

Title: Calculus I
PreReq: Satisfy Placement Table in this section, MATH 115 or both MATH 112 and MATH 113 with “C” (2.0) or better.
